element.name: TZoomDragTool
element.short: Tool for zooming while dragging the mouse over the area to be magnified

element.name: TChartTool.EscapeCancels
element.short: Cancels the current operation of the chart tool by pressing the ESC key
element.descr: When the property EscapeCancels is true the current operation of the currently active chart tool, e.g. dragging the mouse for zooming, can be aborted by pressing the ESC key.
